Direct Entry Requirements:
(i) Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Accounting or Economics and one other subject.

(ii) NCE merit in relevant subjects.

(iii) ND credit.










(iv) Foundation International exam such as ICAN, ACCA, ICMA, GPFA.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
Subjects: Mathematics, one Social Science subject and any other subject

UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes including English Language, Mathematics, Economics and two (2) other relevant subjects.
Subjects: Mathematics, Economics and any other Social Science subject

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes in Economics and any one of Mathematics, Statistics, Geography, Physics, Chemistry, Agricultural Science, Accounting, Business Management, History and Government.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in English Language, Mathematics, Economics and any two (2) of Arts or Social Science subjects.
Subjects: Economics, Mathematics and any of Government, History, Geography, Literature in English, French and Christian Religious Studies /Islamic Studies.

UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes to include English Language, Government or History and three (3) relevant subjects.

(i)    Two (2)'A' Level passes in Arts or Social Science subjects.

 

(ii)   NCE/ND/First Degree (Second Class Lower).

Direct Entry Requirements: Two (2) 'A' Level passes including Government or History.
UTME Requirements: Five (5) SSC credit passes in Government or History, English Language and three (3) other subjects.  A pass in Mathematics is required.
